Filtros de la capa convolucional 3:
constant FMAP_1_1: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("11110111","00000011","00000000","11111111","00000100"),
    ("11111010","00000000","11110011","11101111","11110001"),
    ("00000100","00000101","00001100","11111100","00001000"),
    ("11111011","11111000","00000010","00000101","00000000"),
    ("00000100","11111001","11111101","00000110","11110110")
);

constant FMAP_2_1: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("11101101","11110001","11111111","11111111","00001000"),
    ("11101111","11101011","00000011","00000000","11101111"),
    ("00001001","11111110","11011101","11101000","00000011"),
    ("11111010","11111100","00010100","00001101","00010011"),
    ("00000101","00001100","00010001","00001110","11111010")
);

constant FMAP_3_1: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("11110111","00000000","11110100","11110101","00001100"),
    ("11110110","11110111","11110011","00010001","00001001"),
    ("00010001","11111011","11110111","11111101","11110011"),
    ("00001001","11110110","11101010","11010000","11101001"),
    ("00000011","11111010","11111010","11110011","11110001")
);

constant FMAP_4_1: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("11110111","00001110","00000010","11111000","11111101"),
    ("00000010","11111011","11111001","00000001","11111011"),
    ("11111111","00000001","11110110","00000010","11110110"),
    ("00001001","11111000","11111111","11111101","11111111"),
    ("11111110","11110101","11111101","11111001","00000010")
);

constant FMAP_5_1: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("00000001","00001000","00000010","00000101","00000000"),
    ("00000010","11111001","11111010","00001011","00000100"),
    ("00000010","00001110","00001111","11111100","11111010"),
    ("11110100","11111101","11111110","00001100","00001001"),
    ("11111000","11111111","00000001","00001110","00000010")
);

    ("00000100","00000000","00000001","00000010","11111000"),
    ("11111111","00010000","00000001","11110111","11110111"),
    ("00000000","00001010","00010001","00001110","00001101"),
    ("00000000","00001100","00000100","00010011","00000000"),
    ("11100111","11111010","11111101","11111101","00000001")
);

    ("11111100","11111101","00000111","00001000","00010000"),

    ("00000100","11111110","11110010","11101100","11110001")

    ("00000110","11110100","11111010","00001010","11101011"),
    ("00000101","11111111","11111101","00001001","00000000"),
    ("00000000","00000000","00000011","00010101","00010111")

    ("00001111","11111101","11101010","11110100","11111110"),
    ("00010110","00000100","11100010","00001100","00010111"),
    ("00010101","11110111","00000010","00001111","00010001"),
    ("11110010","11110110","00000111","00000010","00001111"),
    ("11110010","11111100","00000111","00000000","00001100")
);

constant FMAP_5_12: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("00000101","00000100","11111111","11101111","11100101"),
    ("00001110","00000111","00000001","11011000","11101101"),
    ("00010000","00010111","11110110","11100111","00000001"),
    ("00001001","11111100","11100010","11111100","00001010"),
    ("00001001","11110011","11110110","00000101","00000000")
);

    ("00001101","00010001","11110111","11101000","11110100"),
    ("00000001","11111101","11100111","11110100","00000100"),
    ("00000111","11111000","11101111","00000001","11111100"),
    ("11111110","11110101","11110101","11111010","11111100"),
    ("00001000","11111111","00000000","00000001","00000100")
);

    ("00001101","00010000","00010100","11110111","11100100"),

    ("00010111","00001011","00000010","11111110","00001001"),

    ("00000011","11111101","00000001","00000011","00010001"),
    ("11110100","11101110","00010010","00000010","00000000"),

    ("11110010","11101110","11110011","00000000","00000100"),
    ("11111101","11111000","11110010","11110110","00010010"),
    ("11111101","11101010","11101101","00000111","00010011"),
    ("00000000","11101010","00010001","00001100","11110100"),
    ("11110011","00000110","00001110","11111111","11101001")

constant FMAP_6_16: FILTER_TYPE:= (
    ("00000101","11101100","11101110","00000010","00010001"),
    ("11111101","11111011","00000001","11111100","00000101"),
    ("11111001","00000110","00001000","11111001","11101010"),
    ("00000001","11111100","11111100","00000001","11111010"),
    ("00000101","11111111","11110101","11110101","11110010")
);

Sesgos de la capa convolucional 3:
constant BIAS_VAL_1: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111000";
constant BIAS_VAL_2: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111110";
constant BIAS_VAL_3: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000010";
constant BIAS_VAL_4: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000001";
constant BIAS_VAL_5: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111101";
constant BIAS_VAL_6: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111100";
constant BIAS_VAL_7: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111100";
constant BIAS_VAL_8: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111010";
constant BIAS_VAL_9: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000011";
constant BIAS_VAL_10: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000001";
constant BIAS_VAL_11: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111111";
constant BIAS_VAL_12: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000010";
constant BIAS_VAL_13: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000101";
constant BIAS_VAL_14: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000010";
constant BIAS_VAL_15: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "00000001";
constant BIAS_VAL_16: signed (BIASES_SIZE-1 downto 0) := "11111111";
